creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund
description: Short jacket of taupe cut velvet on taupe ribbed gound. The design includes a crane, branching pine trees, spotted deer and the fungus; all symbols of longevity. Standing collar, bound with black satin. Medium wide sleeves and edges also bound with balck satin. Note two patch pockets on under flap of front. A woman's jacket.
title: Short Jacket
